plot: Anson Sykes, inadvertently responsible for the death of his only daughter, begins tracing her ghost from the cool, leafy suburbs of Greater London back to Ireland where destiny unfurls and reasserts his life anew.
title: Abbot's Approach
plot_es: Anson Sykes, inadvertently responsible for the death of his only daughter, begins tracing her ghost from the cool, leafy suburbs of Greater London back to Ireland where destiny unfurls and reasserts his life anew.
plot_en: Anson Sykes, inadvertently responsible for the death of his only daughter, begins tracing her ghost from the cool, leafy suburbs of Greater London back to Ireland where destiny unfurls and reasserts his life anew.
